EmailTemplate.name: Accelerate_Cloud_Migration.Accelerate_Cloud_Migration_Nurture_5_Turbo Value Prop
EmailTemplate.subject: Accelerate and De-risk your Cloud Migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Let us Help you with your Cloud Migration Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
If you're struggling to figure out how to accelerate and de-risk your cloud migration, we can help.
Turbonomic software provides real-time resource allocation that assures performance, lowers cost, and maintains compliance. It empowers Infrastructure and Operations teams to be the drivers of successful public cloud strategies, not bottle-necks.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources-b/cloud-migration-evaluation/]]>
If you're ready, we'd love to learn more about the challenges you face and to show you how we can help. Please sign up for your complimentary cloud migration evaluation <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources-b/cloud-migration-evaluation/]]> today. Regards, Team Turbonomic
